entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is an elf who has been given permission by Harry Potter to visit him sometimes. He appears in the darkness with large, round, green eyes and tries to wish Harry a Merry Christmas.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who has given Dobby permission to visit him sometimes.

relationships.description: Dobby and Harry have a friendly relationship, as evidenced by the fact that Harry has given Dobby permission to visit him sometimes.
